main event: A typed document from the Department of the Air Force, Headquarters Foreign Technology Division (AFDC), regarding a UFO observation report in Christianburg, Ohio on 15 Feb 67.
interesting points: The information received was not sufficient for a scientific evaluation, and the Air Force requested the witness to complete a questionnaire (ATIC Form 16A) to provide more details.
The questionnaire asked about the date, time, location, duration, and details of the sighting, as well as weather conditions, appearance of the object, and any physical evidence.
The witness reported seeing a 'glowing light' that was 'silent, moving erratically and slowly 1-2 miles below dark cloud cover for 10-15 minutes'.
The witness was asked to draw a sketch showing the motion and direction of the object, but no sketch was provided in the image.
The witness was also asked if anyone else saw the object with them, but the names and addresses were redacted.
